mean_en: to give things to a large number of people; to share something between a number of people; to send goods to shops/stores and businesses so that they can be sold
sentence: They distribute food to the people in need.
sentence_trans: 他们把食物分发给有需要的人。
word_etyma: dis分开 + tribute赠品 → 分开给 → distribute分配；区分
